InventoryID: Paestum 1748, from area N. of Porta Aurea
Bibliographic References: PPSupp, no. 53, pi. 4a; Marzullo, Tombe dipinte, pp. 12Non Sepcified14, fig. 3; Patroni, KPfigs. 16Non Sepcified17.
Imagery Description: (a) Young satyr, holding phiale and wreath, bending forward in front of Dionysos, (b) Bv, with spray and egg, + A2r, with stick.
